sentences.sContent: The first British attempt to colonize Ireland was in the twelfth century.
sentences.sCn: 英国第一次企图把爱尔兰变成殖民地是在12世纪。

remMethod.val: 来自colony(n. 殖民地； 群体)

words.tran: 殖民主义者的；奉行殖民主义的
殖民者；殖民地居民；移民
殖民者；殖民地开拓者；移入选民；移民

trans.tranOther: to establish political control over an area or over another country, and send your citizens there to settle
